code: import axios from'axios';const baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/api/persons';const getAll=()=>{const request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(response=>response.data);};const create=newObject=>{const request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);return request.then(response=>response.data);};const remove=id=>{const url="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id);const request=axios.delete(url);return request.then(response=>response.data);};const update=(id,updatedObject)=>{const url="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id);const request=axios.put(url,updatedObject);return request.then(response=>response.data);};export default{getAll,create,remove,update};
